title: Forever Mine: The Beta's Mate
description: After two of his brothers and his friend found their mates within a month's time, Ethan is craving the closeness of his own true mate. Campbell Nightshade, the Alpha's mate and pack seer, has told him his mate will be coming soon, but as time goes by Ethan is beginning if that's true. To the shock of all, his mate comes in a most unlikely form, that of Reese Bohannon - the man who assisted John Harris in his plan to kill Kellan's mate. Ethan is drawn to his mate, but can he ever find a way to forgive him for the crimes against the Rue Pack. Reese Bohannon is an Omega wolf and an outcast in the North Pack. He lives his life as an outcast in a cabin on the edge of the Pack lands. When John Harris threatens his life and lives of those he cares for, he goes against his better judgement and help's John can access to the Rue Pack lands. The biggest shock for him, is finding his true mate while lying in a jail cell. Reese doesn't know if his mate will every forgive him, or at the very least acknowledge him. Can these true mates find their way to a forever love, or will the past stand in the way?
author: B.A. Stretke
